internal_testing.release_notes:
Internal testing build for TailTracker v1.0.0

🔧 BUILD DETAILS:
• Version: 1.0.0 (Build 1)
• Target SDK: 34 (Android 14)
• Min SDK: 26 (Android 8.0)
• Build Type: Debug with release optimizations

✅ FEATURES TO TEST:
• Complete pet profile management
• Real-time GPS tracking functionality
• Safe zone creation and monitoring
• Push notification delivery
• Family sharing features
• In-app purchase flows
• Location permission handling
• Background location tracking

🧪 TESTING PRIORITIES:
1. Location tracking accuracy and reliability
2. Safe zone alerts and geofencing
3. Battery usage optimization
4. Push notification delivery
5. Family sharing permissions
6. App performance and stability
7. UI/UX across different devices
8. In-app purchase functionality

⚠️ KNOWN ISSUES:
• Location updates may be delayed in low signal areas
• Some premium features still in development
• Debug logging enabled (will be removed for production)

📱 TEST DEVICES:
• Test on both phone and tablet form factors
• Verify functionality across Android 8.0 - 14
• Test with different location service settings

🔍 SPECIFIC TEST SCENARIOS:
1. Create multiple pet profiles with photos
2. Set up safe zones and test boundary alerts
3. Share pets with family members
4. Test location tracking during movement
5. Verify push notifications work correctly
6. Test subscription purchase flow
7. Check app behavior with location disabled
8. Test offline functionality

📧 FEEDBACK:
Report all issues to qa@tailtracker.com with:
• Device model and Android version
• Steps to reproduce
• Screenshots/screen recordings
• Logs if available

This build expires in 90 days.

closed_testing.description: Beta testing with external pet owners
closed_testing.feedback_instructions:
TailTracker Beta Testing Instructions

🎯 TESTING GOALS:
Help us create the perfect pet safety app by testing core features and providing feedback on your experience.

📋 WHAT TO TEST:

1. Pet Profile Setup
   • Create profiles for your actual pets
   • Add photos and personal information
   • Test profile editing and updates

2. Location Tracking
   • Enable location permissions
   • Start tracking and move around
   • Check accuracy and update frequency
   • Test tracking in different environments

3. Safe Zones
   • Create safe zones around your home/yard
   • Test entry/exit notifications
   • Adjust zone sizes and settings

4. Family Sharing
   • Invite family members or friends
   • Test different permission levels
   • Verify shared notifications

5. Notifications
   • Test all notification types
   • Check notification timing
   • Verify sound and vibration settings

6. Premium Features
   • Explore premium subscription options
   • Test unlock flow (free access for beta)
   • Use advanced features like location history

🔍 FEEDBACK AREAS:

• Ease of Use: Is the app intuitive?
• Location Accuracy: How precise is tracking?
• Battery Impact: Does it drain your battery?
• Notification Quality: Are alerts helpful?
• Feature Usefulness: What's most/least valuable?
• Performance: Any crashes or slowdowns?
• Missing Features: What would you add?

📧 HOW TO PROVIDE FEEDBACK:

• Use built-in feedback form in app
• Email beta@tailtracker.com
• Join our beta Discord: discord.gg/tailtracker-beta
• Weekly feedback surveys via email

⭐ BETA PERKS:
• Free premium features during beta
• Direct line to development team
• Early access to new features
• Influence on final product design
• Special beta tester recognition

🤝 BETA GUIDELINES:
• Test with real pets for authentic feedback
• Report bugs promptly and clearly
• Participate in weekly feedback sessions
• Be patient with occasional issues
• Help fellow beta testers in community

Thank you for helping make TailTracker amazing!
